Articles.Content:
It seems that KSP causes PCs to slow down and makes google chrome bugged.

This is happening to me since 0.24 and appearently I am not the only one. When I play and then shut the game, my PC is like super laggy for a while. It also makes this strange bug with google chrome. I can't type anything to the address bar and I can't switch between tabs. Almost all of the people experiencing this bug were playing KSP just before this occoured.

Read the comments bellow this thread: http://www.reddit.com/r/chrome/comments/20yvdf/cant_click_different_tabs_change_the_address_bar/

Somebody should take a look on it. Thx.

It's not a Chrome bug; it's a Windows/Unity bug. And it only happens with the x64 version of KSP.

For whatever reason, Unity fails to let go of the mouse handler when it closes in a lot of cases, and Windows either stops registering left-click properly, or it registers left-click as a right-click instead.

The fix is just to right click somewhere deliberately. It's not a major glitch, but it's not something Squad can fix, as far as I'm aware. Just one of the frankly many glitches surrounding x64 builds of Unity applications at the moment.
